nodes.text: Codenka Mafurias was the moniker used by the creator of the podracing poster "The Sport's Greatest Rivalry," which depicted the rivalry between podracers Ben Quadinaros and Sebulba in the final decades of the Galactic Republic before the outbreak of the Clone Wars. Mafurias was originally widely believed to be a talented Nikto female illustrator from the planet Malastare who was on the payroll of the Grand Hutt Council; however, it later became assumed that it was actually an alias used by an art workshop financially backed by Marlo the Hutt.
Codenka Mafurias was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
